column3: Administer health care or medical treatments
column5: Respond to emergencies to provide assistance
column9: Perform emergency medical procedures which are complex, intensive or critical
column11: Transport patients to and from medical facilities
column15: Inform medical professionals regarding patient conditions and care
column19: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column23: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column25: Advise others on health care issues
column29: Prevent and control infections according to policies and procedures
column31: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column33: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column35: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column37: Maintain a working understanding of the cultural, diversity and accessibility needs of others, and how this applies to the role
column41: Interact with patients to build rapport or provide emotional support
column43: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
